title: Non- application of sections 38 to 46 of the Law.
content: 46A. The provisions of sections 38 to 46 of the Law shall not apply in relation to shares or debentures, to which the Public Offer and Prospectus Law and/or the Open Ended Undertakings for Collective Investments in Transferable Securities (UCITS) and for Related Matters Law apply. Allotment Prohibition of allotment unless minimum subscription received . Fourth Schedule.
